title: Artist Profile: Emir Šehanović
body:
Digital photo collages and physical layer edits.

70’s stock images made kaleidoscopic and bizarre. Stacked up swirls of coloured paper make up almost the innards, like a cross section of a landscape, within lace smothered Victorian portraits; creating a third dimension in a two dimensional context.

#gallery-1 { margin: auto; } #gallery-1 .gallery-item { float: left; margin-top: 10px; text-align: center; width: 33%; } #gallery-1 img { border: 2px solid #cfcfcf; } #gallery-1 .gallery-caption { margin-left: 0; } /\* see gallery\_shortcode() in wp-includes/media.php \*/

[![](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/Zumrin_Zapis_3-150x150.jpg)](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/arts/22023-artist-profile-emir-sehanovic/attachment/zumrin_zapis_3)

[![](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/Zumrin_Zapis_2-150x150.jpg)](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/arts/22023-artist-profile-emir-sehanovic/attachment/zumrin_zapis_2)

[![](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/Shaban_big-150x150.jpg)](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/arts/22023-artist-profile-emir-sehanovic/attachment/shaban_big)

  

[![](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/BBW_5-150x150.jpg)](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/arts/22023-artist-profile-emir-sehanovic/attachment/bbw_5)

[![](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/symetrical-tendancies-150x150.jpg)](https://admin.crackintheroad.com/arts/22023-artist-profile-emir-sehanovic/attachment/symetrical-tendancies)

  

Emir also works within the art group ‘[Manufaktura](http://en.manufaktura.com/)’ and ‘[Art of Asfal](http://www.sergejvutuc.com/index.php?/project/art-of-asfalt/)t’ collective that brought together artists from the republics of Ex-Yugoslavia.

[http://esh.ba/](http://esh.ba/)
